price: 48. And they say: "When will be this promise (the torment or the Day of Resurrection), if you speak the truth?"
arabic: وَيَقُولُونَ مَتَىٰ هَٰذَا ٱلۡوَعۡدُ إِن كُنتُمۡ صَٰدِقِينَ
